phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
Oohashi High School Cultural Festival (Part Two)
The cultural festival is almost here.
Lower your waists, and then... brainwashing beam!
Somehow, everyone is managing to cooperate.
Vice-President, we are running out of posters.
Got it, I will get more printed -
Vice-President, about how we are going to divide the campus...
Oh, that is already sorted out.
Somehow, everyone is giving it their best.
I am just trying this, but how do I look?
You are shining so much that it is almost blinding!
I do not think this is all that bad.
Do you think I will be all right without a shower?
Oh, you are going out for dinner with your father...
Your father is really doing the best he can.
He takes time out of his busy schedule to take you to a restaurant every night -
I cannot forgive him for what he is done,
no matter how hard he tries to make up for it.
he knows several good places to eat.
Being around him is not that bad.
I did not say anything, right?
I do not even have time to change because he is so early.
So that really is your father's car.
You are not secretly laughing at me, right?
Hey, he is waiting for you.
Her father has really been trying since then.
He is doing his best to make up for the lost time and trust.
But it is not just her father who is doing his best...
Well, it is about the cultural festival.
Everyone, the cultural festival is tomorrow!
Hey, where are the make-up tools?
I have to ask the Stupid Chihuahua for help!
Well, your father said he is going to come,
so just make up your mind here.
Stay here and do not move for ten minutes!
Do not come in until I have sorted this out with the Stupid Chihuahua.
I am sorry, I am sorry.
You are giving me a present...
You must be up to something.
Gosh, Stupid Chihuahua, that is not it at all.
Is not this from a super famous restaurant?!
I went with my father yesterday, and I wanted to get you a present.
I have heard that even my friends in modelling cannot get these...
No, I want to enjoy them with some red tea at -
Now you have to listen to me.
So you really were up to something!
Just this once, switch characters with me on the day of the cultural festival.
I want to play a good character!
To think that Taiga wants to play the protagonist...
Well, her father is coming to watch her,
so she wants to show him her good side.
Kushieda, you know about her family situation, right?
Recently, her father has been trying to rebuild their relationship -
Why are you so mad all of a sudden?!
I have to wake Taiga up.
I have to tell her that a father like that is not trustworthy.
Why do you have to do something so cruel?
As her best friend, should not you be happy for her?
How can I be happy for my best friend when her father is coming back to trick her?
I cannot just stand by and watch a friend get hurt.
Are not you going a bit over the top?!
Do not just start making decisions when you have no idea what is going on!
Taiga's father is a good man who places his daughter before everythi -
You met him, did not you?
How can you say that after meeting him?!
Takasu-kun, did not you examine him carefully when you met him?!
Did your eyes not see him clearly?!
Hey you, that is my spot.
See, this is my spot after all.
I do not understand how you could get mad at the girl you like.
I cannot believe she would actually say those things...
Even if you complain to me, I will not console you, you know.
Come on, let us go back and rehearse.
But I just completely destroyed the atmosphere -
No problem, I have got your back.
Look, it will be all right if you go back with me.
Do not ask me, figure it out for yourself.
I will not cling to you like Taiga,
nor will I become your sunshine like Minori-chan.
Oh, what you told me before, about being equal -
will take the same path as you,
but I will always be a little ahead of you.
You have been coming home very late recently...
I cannot do anything about it.
I have to prepare for the cultural festival.
Hey, I heard Taiga-chan is going to move soon...
It was really noisy when I was sleeping at noon.
I am sorry for all the noise.
He said he was Taiga-chan's father,
and that the apartment is too small for the two of them to live there together.
Somehow, I think he is a selfish father.
He just comes back all of a sudden, then -
Why are you saying that too?!
No, is not this a good thing?
I mean, they are going to begin their lives anew in their new house.
It is not good at all!
I want Taiga-chan to stay here!
She is part of our family!
Why did not Taiga-chan talk to me about it?
She is still not back yet?
Tomorrow is the day of the play, too...
Her father should have given this more thought.
No, if Taiga thinks it is okay, then it is okay.
Everything is going smoothly for them.
What are we going to talk about tonight?
It is about Minorin, not me.
I do not think I said anything wrong...
It is not about who is right and who is wrong...
There are more important things than that.
That is why we need things like apologies and forgiveness.
How can I calm down, Taka -
I just felt I was being too much trouble yesterday,
so I decided I would try my best as the bad guy today.
You know, a half-assed attitude is good enough for you!
If you do not hurry up,
you will not be able to spend time with her today...
You are probably the only one who would fit!
Do not give me that pathetic face.
According to our ticket brokers, 80 of the seats are already taken.
If that is the case, we might even have people standing!
I wish good luck to the first performance of Class 2-C's Pro Wrestling Show!
2-C's Pro Wrestling Show is really good?
I heard that Kawashima Ami is wearing a super short mini-skirt!
They say the Palmtop Tiger and the delinquent, Takasu, are hilarious!
our homeroom teacher's string of fate!
Are not you all Class 2-C's friends?
I am starting to get nervous.
Master Tiger, please tell me what I should do with this red string!
Did she just bite her tongue?
Hey, that is not in the script!
I guess it cannot be helped.
Take our homeroom teacher to the morgue!
A place where you keep dead bodies.
Fighter Ami, if you can understand their hearts,
you will be able to free them!
This is your most important attacking chance.
Who is the most beautiful person in this world?
Damn you and your stupid tricks!
the Palmtop Tiger versus Kawashima Ami!
You are going too far, man.
You even went to Ami-chan's villa!
Here I go, you tiny tiger.
My back is going to break!
Just hold it for a bit.
You will be able to do it to me after we switch.
It is so stuffy in this...
You know, our next performance will be...
I-It is not like it matters if you do not drink my tea...
Your prince is here for you!
It is just another cosplay cafe.
There are a lot of guests coming.
Yes, that is because the vice-president went and advertised at the neighbouring schools.
Our first performance was a great success.
Let me have a bit from the side.
E-Eat as much as you want.
R-Ryuuji, you take a bite too.
It is time for the student council to patrol.
I am sorry, you guys head on first.
Are you trying to kill me?!
Now, it is about time for the next show.
You were the one who stuffed it in my mouth.
By the way, did your father send you a message yet?
Were not you checking your cell the whole time?
Well, there are a few more performances left.
If your father comes, just switch with Kawashima -
Just think about what you are going to do with Minorin.
In the end, Taiga did not have to play the protagonist.
Was Kushieda right about me not seeing anything clearly?
If so, I am a really...
